title: Here's a list of 20 articles up to 2022 that focus on various issues related to knowledge graph construction from text
**"A Survey on Knowledge Graphs: Representation, Acquisition, and Applications"** - Ji, Shaoxiong, et al
**"Constructing and Mining Knowledge Graphs from Text"** - Hogan, Aidan, et al
**"Knowledge Graph Embeddings: A Survey of Approaches and Applications"**
**"Neural Open Information Extraction"** - Stanovsky, Gabriel, et al
**"Joint Extraction of Entities and Relations Based on a Novel Tagging Scheme"**
**"OpenIE6: Iterative Grid Labeling and Coordination Analysis for Open Information Extraction"** - Kolluru, Keshav, et al
**"Bootstrapping Named Entity Recognition in E-commerce with Little Data"**
**"A Review of Relational Machine Learning for Knowledge Graphs"**
**"Learning to Represent Knowledge Graphs with Gaussian Embedding"** - He, Xiangnan, et al
**"DeepDive: A Data Management System for Automatic Knowledge Base Construction"** - Zhang, Ce, et al
**"Open Information Extraction from the Web"**
**"Towards Open Domain Event Extraction from Twitter: A Few Things to Consider"** - Ritter, Alan, et al
**"Scalable Construction and Reasoning of Massive Knowledge Bases"**
**"Knowledge Graph Embedding by Translating on Hyperplanes"** - Wang, Zhen, et al
**"A Survey of Open Information Extraction"** - Niklaus, Christina, et al
**"Building a Knowledge Graph from Unstructured Text"** - Paulheim, Heiko
**"Joint Entity Recognition and Relation Extraction as a Multi-Head Selection Problem"** - Bekoulis, Giannis, et al
**"Text2KG: A General Framework for Joint Extraction and Verification of Entities and Relations"** - Zhang, Wenhan, et al
**"Neural Knowledge Extraction From Text"** - Yao, Lifu, et al
**"A Neural Layered Model for Nested Named Entity Recognition"** - Ju, Meizhi, et al
These articles cover a range of topics from foundational surveys and methodologies to specific techniques and applications in the field of knowledge graph construction from text
